reviews.review: I got this 'cause I was sick of missing textures on Gmod.
im a complete fuckin zoomer and literally never experienced the high time of this game or games as a whole but goddamnit is this game fun to fuck around with when you got a friend or 3
I'm not one for multiplayer shooters, so this doesn't interest me, but it's necessary to play GMod.
muy entretenido a pesar de los a√±os sigue estando activo ta bueno

gREAT SERVER iVE BEEN PLAYING THIS GAME FOR 20 YEARS

The minigame servers? Those were incredible, and I still wish they could return to their former glory.

The zombie escape servers? I spent a lot of time struggling, yet still having fun with those. 

The regular servers running de_dust2? Eeeeeehhhh....
a game that I think is pretty good because this game is still very exciting because there are so many lanes that we can enter
El juego esta copada,recomiendo esta version ya que se puede jugar en serv piratas
es como el csgo pero mas barato

Amazing Game 10/10... the servers are 100% run by the community tho... so watch out what you join... i've found my personal server group where i mostly play on ! It's so much fun ! Even in 2022 and it actually feels so much more fun than cs:go...
